name: ohio

a state in the northeastern US, whose capital city is Columbus: He is a teacher who lives in Ohio. Ohio was the largest producer of sugar at the time.
More examplesFewer examplesShe raised her children in the Ohio county where she grew up.In Ohio we kept our eyes on the prize.
